nodes.text: An individual served as a minor official for Millennium Entertainments and employed the Tiss'shar gunslinger, Uul-Rha-Shan, as a bodyguard at one point. The Tiss'shar did well enough as a bodyguard for the official to earn an Authority Cash Voucher. While accompanied by Uul-Rha-Shan during a promotional viewing of Who Are You To Accuse Me? in Mondder, the capital city, the individual was present for a terrorist attack by the Duroon Rebels. During the battle, the official's bodyguard saved the live of the individual serving as Assistant Advisory Undersecretary of Media.
